experiments.name: contact_memory_en

game_instances.prompt: What is the first name of the person who likes playing guitar?
What is the first name of the person who has black hair?
What is the last name of the person works for CVS Health?
What is the first name of the person works for Foxconn?
What is the first name of the person works for TotalEnergies?

experiments.initial_prompt:
Your task is to remember person contact information including first name, last name, work, email, as well as hobbies and physical attributes. Important: You have to remember contact information for many people. 

Here is some information about a person that I need you to remember:

name is Amanda Long, email is amanda.long@yahoo.com, works for Elevance Health, likes Playing guitar.

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

name is Steven Morris, email is stevenmorris@yahoo.ca, works for China Railway Engineering Corporation, likes Studying history, has Black hair.

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

name is Elijah Williams, email is elijahwilliams@mail.ru, works for CVS Health, likes Wine tasting.

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

name is Christian Davis, email is christiandavis@hotmail.ca, works for Foxconn, likes Baking.

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

name is Bradley Roberts, email is bradleyroberts@orange.fr, works for TotalEnergies, likes Astronomy, has a Square jawline.


Please answer the following: $PROMPT$ Do not answer in a complete sentence. Only give the information requested.
